# Practical One

#### Question 1

```{r}
head(airquality)
df <- airquality
na_row <- c()

for (i in 1:nrow(df)){
  for (col in 1:ncol(df)){
    if(is.na(df[i, col])){
      na_row <- c(na_row, i)
      break
    }
  }
}

print(na_row)
air_data <- na.omit(airquality) #Remove NA values from airquality data set and save an df

sum(!complete.cases(airquality))

```

#### Question 2

```{r}
##Ozone Statistics
min(air_data$Ozone)
max(air_data$Ozone)
mean(air_data$Ozone)
sd(air_data$Ozone)

##Temp Statistics
min(air_data$Temp)
max(air_data$Temp)
mean(air_data$Temp)
sd(air_data$Temp)


```

#### Question 3

```{r}
head(cars)
df <- cars
Y <- df$dist
speed <- df$speed 
X <- cbind(1, speed)
b <- solve(t(X) %*% X)  %*% t(X) %*% Y ## %*% means perform matrix multiplication
print(b)

model <- lm(dist ~ speed, data= cars)
summary(model)
```
